tidbits.title: French Overseas Territory
tidbits.description: New Caledonia is a French overseas territory in the Pacific known for its diverse landscapes, including coral reefs and lush forests.

tidbits.title: Kanak Culture
tidbits.description: The Kanak people have a rich culture on the islands, with traditional arts, customs, and ceremonies, contributing to New Caledonia's identity.

tidbits.title: Natural Beauty
tidbits.description: The territory's natural beauty extends to the UNESCO-listed lagoon, the world's largest, and a range of endemic flora and fauna.
